User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"营销策划方案"，设置字体为"Microsoft YaHei"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "营销策划方案", level=1);set_font_style("Microsoft YaHei");

User instruction: 添加目录，并设置为三级目录。
添加二级标题"市场分析"、"营销策略"和"预算规划"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "市场分析", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "营销策略", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "预算规划", level=2);

User instruction: 在"市场分析"下插入一个饼图展示市场份额。
Feasible API sequence: create_pie_chart(["我司", "竞争对手A", "竞争对手B", "其他"], [35, 30, 25, 10], title="市场份额分布");

User instruction: 在"营销策略"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "产品策略", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "价格策略", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "渠道策略", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "促销策略", style="List Number");

User instruction: 在"预算规划"下添加一个4行3列的表格。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 4, 3);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "营销项目");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "预算金额");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "执行周期");
